LogicTwoInputOr

This component performs a logical OR operation on the Boolean data presented to the input ports and presents the result of the logical operation to the output data port.

A logical OR will present a value of "TRUE" to the data output if any of the data inputs are "TRUE".

The logical operation is performed when the input event is triggered and the result of the Boolean operation is presented to the Boolean data output. The output event is triggered to signal the completion of the logical operation.

Ports

  • [In] :

    Data input, one of the Boolean values to be OR'd together.

  • [In] :

    Data input, one of the Boolean values to be OR'd together.

  • [Out] :

    Data output, the result of the OR operation.

  • [In] :

    Event input, triggers the OR operation.

  • [Out] :

    Event output, triggered when the OR operation is completed.

Parameters

None.

State Machine

Stateless.

Profiles

All.

Toolbox

Core.

Version

v2.1.

Native Dependencies

  • TDK1.1:

Licence Type

LGPL.

Component Supplier

inx ltd.
